LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.label: extended armor plate
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.description: composite armor attachments that suitable for battle frame pylons, which can effectively resist direct hits to the chassis from various threats such as fragments and medium-caliber gunfire.
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.label: extended cargo rack
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.description: Side mounted cargo racks that suitable for battle frame pylons, which can effectively increase the carrying capacity of battle frame and its variants.
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.label: ceramic plates
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.description:
deposable ceramic armorplate that effectively inhibits thermal erosion of bullets or shaped charges.
Although it is an excellent protective armor, it is still essentially a disposable defensive plate and must be completely replaced once damaged.
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.descriptionCached:
deposable ceramic armorplate that effectively inhibits thermal erosion of bullets or shaped charges.
Although it is an excellent protective armor, it is still essentially a disposable defensive plate and must be completely replaced once damaged.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.label: nuclear battery
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.description: The abundant output of installed nuclear fission battery eliminates the need for recharge. it can also be overloaded to produce a nuclear explosion comparable to an anti-gram weapon to destroy the enemy together.
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.label: reinforced frame
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.description: Using tungsten steel to replace parts of the robot's frame that are prone to wear can effectively improve the durability during high-intensity combat and reduce the time spent on maintenance. But in exchange it will significantly increase the weight of the mech and affect its speed.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.label: synthetic tendon
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.description: A biosynthetic muscles attached on the outer layer of mechanical limbs. can effectively increase output but will bring additional energy consumption.
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.label: heavy hydraulic frame
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.description: a heavy hydraulic module and power pack for bipedal mechs, gain capability for heavier lifting and also mount heavy weapons.
